description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Boulogne vs Clermont in the Play-offs 2/3
title: Boulogne vs Clermont: Play-offs 2/3 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Boulogne vs Clermont: Play-offs 2/3 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Boulogne 1, Clermont 3. Famara Di√©dhiou (Clermont) header from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Henri Saivet following a set piece situation.
Booking
Elhadj Dabo (Boulogne) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
